title: Sepp Kuss on Tour de France GC: ‘My Best Chance to Win is if Jonas Vingegaard is There’
content:
'GC Kuss' might yet make an appearance in the 2024 Tour de France. Right now, it's impossible to say which version. 

Read the full article at Sepp Kuss on Tour de France GC: ‘My Best Chance to Win is if Jonas Vingegaard is There’ on Velo.
author: ahood
